snippet: The two-time United States pairs champions Marissa Castelli and Simon Shnapir, who finished ninth at the Olympics, ended their partnership.
abstract: Two-time United States pairs champions Marissa Castelli and Simon Shnapir, who finished ninth at the 2014 Olympics, end their skating partnership.
lead_paragraph: The two-time United States pairs champions Marissa Castelli and Simon Shnapir, who finished ninth at the Olympics, ended their partnership.
